title: Data Analyst
description: Looking for a Data Analyst with experience in Python, Excel, SQL, and data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Need someone with strong understanding of machine learning, Python, Scikit-learn, Pandas, and NumPy. Experience with deep learning is a plus.

title: Backend Developer
description: Seeking a Backend Developer with proficiency in Flask or Django, APIs, SQL, and good software engineering practices.
